期待官方支持完善

## 文本聊天

```js
import { chat, config } from "dashscope";

const data = {
  messages: [
    {
      role: "system",
      content: "你是达摩院的生活助手机器人。",
    },
    {
      role: "user",
      content: "欧洲最富裕的家族",
    },
  ],
};

chat(data).then((r) => {
  console.log(r);
});
```

## 文本生成图片

```js
import { createImage, checkTaskStatus } from "dashscope";

const test = async () => {
  const resp = await createImage({ prompt: "一只奔跑的加菲猫" });
  if (!resp) return;
  const output = resp.output;
  if (output.taskId) {
    const result = await checkTaskStatus(output.taskId);
    console.log(result);
  }
};
```
